alert.note: Alert for Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 6:05PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima County through 645 PM MST... At 604 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tucson, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Tucson International Airport and Catalina Foothills. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 262 and 267. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
